website_summaries.verdict: The E-Fun Nextbook 10.1 is an inexpensive Windows tablet with a price that will turn heads, but the best value doesn't always come with the lowest price.
pros: Free 12-month subscription to Office 365 and 1TB OneDrive storage

customer_reviews.title: More tablet than notebook.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little tablet running windows 8.1. It's more of a tablet than a laptop, metro apps work well, but the biggest drawback is only having 1gb ram. It's fine for a few tabs open in chrome, but not much more. I did manage to get windows 10 preview installed, which works well enough. A few hoops are necessary to get screen rotation working and touchscreen, but it's working. I would recommend it, if the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Davis

customer_reviews.title: SUPPLIER not Amazon has not responded to problem with Nextbook
customer_reviews.text: The enter key does not work at all and it shuts off at random would be my dislikes. This is used for work only and like it for the size and ease of not taking up much space and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: charlene sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Shortest relationship ever
customer_reviews.text: I loved it for the first three weeks that it worked. I haven't been able to turn it on since. I finally got around to taking it to a repair shop and the employee helping me told me that it wasn't the battery (as many people suggested) but the motherboard overheated and burned out. I had Pandora Radio on for 4 hours and it overheated the entire device... Solid.
customer_reviews.author: Cait Hart

customer_reviews.title: Preaching the gospel is much easier....
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It does more than what I even want to do. I am a minister and I wanted to be able to have a split screen when necessary to look at scriptures in the bible while having the outline of my sermon at the same time. No more paper outlines... YAY! And it is affordable for my preachers in training to have one also.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT M WASHINGTON SR

customer_reviews.title: Husband still prefers his regular tablet due to keyboard issues.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard will stay on unless on a flat surface. If you pickit up the notebook becomes a coputer without a key board. You can take photo's front and back. A nice feature. to have. Compared the ASUS I purchased it's like comparing apple and oranges. ASUS keyboard is secured and does not come off. ASUS only able to take pictures from facing you.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge. The original adapter does not work ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not charge. The original adapter does not work so I purchased another and that one does not work either. Now I'm a few days late to return item. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: special26k

customer_reviews.title: Nephew Loves His Graduation Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a graduation present for one of my nephews who got straight A's 6 years in a row. He loves it!! Congrats to nephew Myles Davis in Cleveland, Ohio. I wish I could have done more !!!
customer_reviews.author: Donni

customer_reviews.title: it's a great tablet, however where the tablet connects to the ...
customer_reviews.text: it's a great tablet, however where the tablet connects to the keyboard is cheap. mine busted off when putting back on one night. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lanette

customer_reviews.title: it is great.
customer_reviews.text: It has shut down a couple times on my daughter and was unable to turn it back on for a little while. Otherwise, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and a lot less expensive than some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and a lot less expensive than some of the other companies who make this same type of 2x2. Great graphics in particular. I take this one with me instead of the bigger one and it works out great.
customer_reviews.author: Lin M

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old. I got what I paid for the screen cracked almost immediately, but continues to work. I had to replace anot her next book we bought because it wouldnt take a charge, after 1 month of use. I wouldn't recommend it for an adult, but it's ok for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the most powerful computer, but totally does what is advertised. I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN AURAND

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this device and do not buy from this seller!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product from HenryD. Device was used several times, with a combined up time of about 5 hours. The device then refused to charge. Do not buy this device as others have had similar issues with the product. Also the seller refused to reimburse 100% of the money for the device, even though it is clearly defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My nextbook is horrible tryed just setting it up and now it says ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it works great love that I can disconnect from keyboard

customer_reviews.title: Great speed, fantastic back lighting
customer_reviews.text: Great speed, fantastic back lighting, but difficult to get around in. Although I use computer technology on a daily basis, both business and personal, this tablet will take some practice. Looking forward to learning it!

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, great quality

customer_reviews.title: really like it

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tablet/laptop! I love the ability to use it as a laptop OR a tablet, when I want!

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKED FINE FOR TWO WEEKS AND THEN I COULDN'T GET IT ...
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKED FINE FOR TWO WEEKS AND THEN I COULDN'T GET IT TO POWER BACK ON. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND ANYONE BUY THIS TABLET UNTIL THEY FIX THE BUGS WITH THIS TABLET.

customer_reviews.title: So much better to take to school
customer_reviews.text: So much better to take to school. So much lighter. I wish it had Microsoft Word instead of the version that's installed.

customer_reviews.title: It is a good Tablet. I carry it around alot

customer_reviews.text: Love the size and works great when traveling. Wish it had a regular usb charger but can't have everything. Great for trips!

customer_reviews.title: Nice light duty tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, one flaw.... it only has 1g of physical memory. Awesome tablet for light duty, and the price is great!

customer_reviews.title: Nextbook 10.1... Excellent performance!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my Nextbook 10.1!I is everything I was hoping for and then some! I would HIGHLY recommend this tablet/laptop! It's performance is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Creason

customer_reviews.title: Does what is should, works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our road crew. They just plain work. Battery lasts a long time. Acts just like a normal computer, just smaller and touch screen. Highly recommend. Only issue I have with it is doesn't have a normal USB port. Only a mini USB port. So you have to run an adapter to use USB accessories. Not a real problem, just annoying. There is room for normal USB ports so not sure why they opted for the fragile mini style.
customer_reviews.author: D.P.Industries

customer_reviews.title: Fast fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and he absolutely loves it. He says it's "way fast" and he plays all sorts of CPU intense games.
customer_reviews.author: Hipstr62

customer_reviews.title: ... was a replacement for and our son is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: the Nextbook was a replacement for and our son is very happy with it. it was deliver as promised

customer_reviews.title: I have some problems with the touch screen when it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have some problems with the touch screen when it is not attached to the keyboard. Microsoft store is really disappointing compared to Apple store. I was able to upgrade to Windows 10 without difficulty.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product. It was a little heavier than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. It was a little heavier than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: It was great... while it lasted!
customer_reviews.text: It was siting on my lap and one drop 2 1/2 feet of the ground and now doesnt work at all. The olny thing that give me hope in this device is the chargeing light, but thats it. So i took a tech guys tip(he builds and sells computers) and all the youtube videos, nothing worked. Not yet! Well I suggest saving your money buy a better computer. Dont get me wrong its a great computer(for the price even better than some $300-400 laptops I've used ) but its not very durable

customer_reviews.title: Loved service so much I ordered again.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product and service so much I ordered another one. Great service.

customer_reviews.title: I've had two of these in one month. Both ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these in one month. Both just stopped turning on. not with the money or the hassle. Buy an iPad.

customer_reviews.title: I bought one and came back to buy another for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and came back to buy another for my husband. This tablet offers more than the price if you are a Windows user.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very very pleased with the purchase, it was delivered way ahead of estimated delivery!!

customer_reviews.title: It's a terrible tablet

Also it's touchscreen is horrible because it gets dirty really guide and the mouse pad doesn't work Also when I returned it I had to pay 40 dollars to return it . so I would never get this tablet. It is terrible.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Tablet and Best Paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Worst piece of equipment I've ever purchased. Worked sluggishly for a few weeks and now will hardly boot. Windows 10? It doesn't even boot Windows 8! Why bother? Nice paperweight, though! This is going into the garbage, along with all the accessories I purchased with this iPad wannabe. I would've been $200 closer to a tablet that actually does the thing it was designed to do. Lesson learned. I'm back to Apple products!
customer_reviews.author: Maxify55

customer_reviews.title: Back in computer heaven...
customer_reviews.text: I had an XP netbook or whatever the old OS was called that Microsoft ceased supporting. No one prepared me for what it meant when support was withdrawn. Norton and MacAfee were useless to halt the constant crashes. Advertising programs like ShopperPro came out of nowhere and covered every screen every day with pop-up ads. This machine is a pleasure. The price is reasonable. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Priamsdaughter

customer_reviews.title: Great small PC!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and the Next book is a great product. For a small PC it really does everything I need and more. I would recommend the nextbook.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in excellent condition. The tablet itself is just as amazing. Extremely satisfied.

I can't log my Microsoft word package I already paid for a really long time ago from and for another computer I have and add the account I already have into the next book Microsoft word for some reason so they want me to repay for it so I'm not doing that.

product_meta.title: Nextbook 10.1 Intel Quad Core 2 in 1 Det
product_meta.description: The Nextbook 10.1" Tablet is everything you want in a Windows portable device. It's ultra-fast with a 10.1" IPS display with a detachable foldable POGO keyboard. This new Nextbook comes with a Quad-Core Intel Atom-based processor for optimal performance and the latest Microsoft Windows 8.1 Operating System. For full PC power and total portable fun, there's nothing like a Nextbook 10.1" Tablet. Touch, click or type-you choose what fits your style and activity. All the great apps you need are in the Windows Store, plus you can play Xbox games, music and videos. Plus, with the hard shell POGO keyboard, you can now fold the tablet into the keyboard, like a laptop. This touchscreen notebook Intel Quad-Core 2-In-1 detachable will function as a tablet or laptop!
feature_bullets: Nextbook 10.1 Intel Quad Core 2 in 1 Det
